name: Fintech Pitch Deck Microapp Template
description:
Supercharge your pitch deck


Elevate your content with this template that features everything you need to pitch your business plan with success. This free template covers the current problem, solution, competitive landscape, market size, your business model, the company team, roadmap and more. With this template, you can easily swap your logo, add your brand colors and typography. Catch the attention of your audience by adding videos, embedding websites, image gallery, scrolling and interaction in Tiled. Publish and share your microapp in no time.


You can experience what your next pitch deck could look like here.


You can find the Tiled plugin here.
